name: Untitled Jump Game (Hugo Bailey)
description:
--- UNTITLED JUMP GAME ---

This teeny project was developed in the space of a single day (06.05.2020) in around 8 to 10 hours. The Covid-19 pandemic has meant I have very little to do, and as a bid to keep myself from going insane I aim to create a little game like this every so often to keep myself on my toes. Any bug reports, comments, criticism and advice is welcomed :)

--- CONTROLS ---

  • Press space to jump
  • Collect coins to increase your score faster!
  • That's basically it

--- MUSIC CREDITS ---

Main theme is by B_Sean on Freesound

https://freesound.org/people/B_Sean/sounds/421887/
